code: import ProjectCard from"./ProjectCard";import{projectsList}from"../../Data/projects_list_data";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"projects",className:"py-24 sm:py-32 relative bg-gray-800 text-white overflow-hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto text-center mb-12 px-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{opacity:1,transform:"none"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"inline-block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-teal-200/65 via-cyan-300/65 to-blue-400/65 backdrop-blur-sm border border-border mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"relative z-10 text-foreground/80 text-gray-100",children:t("ashish_portfolio_projects_subtitle")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"absolute inset-0 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-teal-400/20 via-cyan-500/20 to-blue-600/20 animate-pulse"})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-white",style:{opacity:1,transform:"none"},children:t("ashish_portfolio_projects_title")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-24 h-1.5 bg-gradient-to-r from-teal-400 via-cyan-500 to-blue-600 rounded-full mx-auto mt-2",style:{opacity:1,transform:"none"}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mx-auto grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-10 px-4",children:projectsList.map((p,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectCard,{title:t(p.titleKey),description:t(p.descriptionKey),company:t(p.companyKey),tags:p.tagKeys.map(key=>t(key)),imgSrc:p.imgSrc},index))})]});};export default Projects;
